I updated my old 7.0.9.3 with this, but I found that this version seems to have a bad bug where it fails to deinterlace (say, a rip of a TV episode) and it doesn't crop very well (whereas the other one automatically takes off the black edges).

However, the older one had a problem with audio not coming up on files where the DVD files appeared to be connected to each other (no problem for the most part as I can chop off the unneeded part of the clip elsewhere)--and it bizarrely did deinterlace on this particular clip (I may use later versions when it has audio difficulties).

The interlacing and failure to crop are big issues with this one. Anyone else having these problems?

Back to 7.0.9.3 for the most part.
